meanings.definition: A person who puts forward a proposal or theory.
meanings.sent1: The postulators presented their ideas at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The postulators in the debate had different opinions.
meanings.sent3: The postulators at the conference wore colorful hats.
meanings.sent4: She was the postulators of the idea that sparked the project.

meanings.definition: The act of putting forward a proposal or theory.
meanings.sent1: The postulators of the new policy explained their reasoning.
meanings.sent2: The postulators of the plan were well-prepared.
meanings.sent3: The postulators of the theory danced while presenting it.
meanings.sent4: Her postulators of the solution were clear and concise.
meanings.sent5: The postulators of the concept were met with applause.
